arts.ttl: Milan 3 – Lecce 0 | Landucci’s press conference: “On Leao, Nkunku, and more…”
arts.sum: Massimiliano Allegri's assistant coach, Marco Landucci, spoke to the media in a press conference after the Rossoneri's victory against Lecce 3-0 in the Coppa Italia competition. The team shows very positive numbers. "Even tonight we approached the game well. There is a strong working group, a good atmosphere at Milanello. It is paying off and […]

arts.ttl: Milan beat Lecce 3-0 in Coppa italia | Pulisic: “I need to keep this up”
arts.sum: Christian Pulisic spoke to Mediaset after Milan’s 3-0 win over Lecce. He said: Another goal… “I’m in good form. I need to keep this up, but the most important thing is that we won.” What did you say to Santiago Gimenez recently? "I always tell him to be patient because he has played very well […]

arts.ttl: Milan 3 – Lecce 0 | Bartesaghi: “I have nothing to lose and a lot to prove”
arts.sum: After the 3-0 win against Lecce, AC Milan's full-back Davide Bartesaghi spoke to Milan TV. Congrats on your first start of the year: "Thank you. I appreciate it. We are only at the start. We played a great match, we started well, which was not obvious, so it was important to open and close the […]

arts.ttl: Di Francesco: ‘Fair result, no game after Siebert’s red card’ in Milan 3-0 Lecce
arts.sum: Eusebio Di Francesco did not deny the fact that Milan were worthy victors in their...

arts.ttl: Coppa Italia; Milan 3 – Lecce 0 | Landucci: “Happy that Gimenez scored”
arts.sum: Marco Landucci spoke to Mediaset after Milan’s 3-0 win over Lecce. Here is what he said following the team’s progression in the Coppa Italia: Gimenez finally scored: “It’s normal. A striker must score, but his performances have been good. He always made himself available for the team, so it was natural he would score. I’m […]

arts.ttl: Player ratings: Milan 3-0 Lecce – Inspiring Rabiot, Gimenez relief
arts.sum: Milan ran out 3-0 victors over Lecce in the second round of the Coppa Italia...

arts.ttl: AC Milan beat Lecce 3-0 in Coppa Italia – Through to face Lazio
arts.sum: AC Milan beat Lecce at San Siro 3-0 in a Coppa Italia match. In the first 45 minutes of the match, Lecce hardly got out of their own half, especially in the opening stages, and then went down to ten men after Siebert was shown a straight red. Despite countless chances, Milan struggled to score. […]

arts.ttl: AC Milan beats 10-man Lecce 3-0 in Italian Cup to keep alive trophy pursuit without European play
arts.sum: AC Milan beat 10-man Lecce 3-0 on Tuesday to advance to the Italian Cup round of 16 and remain in the running for what might be its best chance at a trophy this season. Milan wasn’t seeded this season because of its eighth-place finish in Serie A last season.

arts.ttl: Watch: Nkunku scores scissor kick and Pulisic nets as Milan go 3-0 up vs. Lecce
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan scored a second and third goal in quick succession to put the Coppa Italia tie against Lecce to bed. Christopher Nkunku had blazed a good chance over minutes prior, but more than made up for it in the 51st minute with his first Milan goal. A corner was taken short to Saelemaekers, who […] The post Watch: Nkunku scores scissor kick and Pulisic nets as Milan go 3-0 up vs. Lecce appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Player Ratings: AC Milan 3-0 Lecce – Rabiot a leader; Gimenez off the mark
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller AC Milan secured their spot in the Coppa Italia Round of 16 after beating Lecce by three goals to nil at San Siro. Several players did well and below are the ratings for the Rossoneri. If you haven’t already, make sure to check out how we decide the player ratings.
